    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
     
    using namespace std;
     
    #define ll long long int
    #define T ll t; cin>>t ; while(t--)
    #define fin freopen("i1.txt","r",stdin)
    #define fout freopen("o1.txt","w",stdout)
    #define fastio ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0)
    #define pf(n) cout<<n<<endl;
    #define pb(x) push_back(x)
     
    int main(){
     
        T {
            string s;
            ll a,b;
     
            cin>>s>>a>>b;
     
            ll no=0;
            ll cnt=0;
            ll pre;
            ll n=s.length();
            no=s[0]-'0';
            if(no>b){
                cout<<"-1"<<endl;
                continue;
            }
     
            for(ll i=1;i<n;i++){
                pre=no;
                no=10*no + (s[i]-'0');
     
                if(no<b) {
                    continue;
                }
                else if(no>b) {
                    if(pre>=a && pre<=b){
                        cnt++;
                        no=s[i]-'0';
                    }else {
                        cnt=-1;
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
     
            cout<<cnt<<endl;
     
        }
     
        return 0;
    }
